review: The simplicity of this device and its price is amazing.  However, the performance seems to be less than stellar.  Unless you choose 480p (instead of 720p) it will occasionally disconnect or it will be jerky.  And I have a high quality 5Ghz 802.11n WiFi access point - and both the Chromecast and my laptop are only 3 meters away from each other.It would be great if other applications could connect to the chromecast... like VLC.  I also don't like how it adjusts the Chrome window - if I have the window maximized, connecting to chromecast will adjust the window a tiny bit.

review: Chromecast is the best $35 you'll ever spend on ANY electronic gadget. Ever. Google Play Music, Google Movies & TV, YouTube and Netflix all stream flawlessly to your TV from your phone or laptop. This device delivers absolutely everything Google promises and performs well above my expectations for such an inexpensive device. Every TV should have this amazing device plugged into it. Setup is a breeze and you will not be disappointed. Chromecast is a highly recommended addition to any home theater system.
